Class FilesystemPersister

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.virginia.lib.ld2solr.spi.ThreadedStage<FilesystemPersister,OutputRecord>
      • edu.virginia.lib.ld2solr.impl.FilesystemPersister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordSink, RecordSink.RecordPersister, Stage<OutputRecord>, Stage.Acceptor<OutputRecord,OutputRecord>

    public class FilesystemPersister
extends ThreadedStage<FilesystemPersister,OutputRecord>
implements RecordSink.RecordPersister
    A RecordSink.RecordPersister that writes OutputRecords to a filesystem.
    Author:
    ajs6f
